Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System – Ertapenem 0.0625-8 μg/mL
BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System-Ertapenem 0.0625-8 μg/mL
BD Phoenix™ Automated Microbiology System – Ertapenem (0.0625-8 μg/mL)
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System panel for in vitro antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Ertapenem by MIC using automated broth microdilution methodology
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by MIC of Gram-negative aerobic/facultative anaerobic bacteria (Enterobacteriaceae, Non-Enterobacteriaceae) and Gram-positive bacteria (Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, Streptococcus) isolates from pure culture
